title: Connection timed out in promos
body: I was banning in my game of promos and it wouldn't let me ban my champion about 10 seconds later it said connection error ( https://gyazo.com/97ab9471d5394e879bc736519b4fab1b ) sent me back into the lobby and now i have a loss no idea why.

replies.body:
It seems you disconnected from the server due to an unstable connection to it. Since the nature of a disconnection is that your client stops sending information to the server, it would look identical to a dodge, which counts as a loss in your promo series. 

PvP.net connection errors are always caused by a poor connection to the server, so as a first step, ensuring your local settings are up to snuff with [our guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), is a good place to start.

Let me know if those steps helped.
So sad it has never happened before because I was trying to lock in I was able to receive chat messages because I was asking who to ban
Yeah, it really sucks that it happened during your promo series. I definitely recommend going through the steps in that connection guide to prevent this from happening in the future.
